column2: data = aligned_kir_scores %>% filter(!is.na(SS)) %>% filter(mutation_type != "S" & mutation_type != "X" & mutation_type != "M")  %>%
facet_grid(rows = vars(factor(SS, levels=SS_level)), cols = vars(len), scales = "free_y") +
geom_density(aes(x = S_score, color = mutation_type), bw="nrd", size=1) +
